mailing-address.narrative: Global Green Growth Institute, 19F Jeongdong Bldg., 21-15 Jeongdong-gil, Jung-gu Seoul 04529 Republic of Korea

title.narrative: (CAEP activity code A389) A series of consultation and coordination meetings/seminars/workshops is designed and organized to disseminate the draft of updated NDC targets in order to socialize, consult and get commitment from related parties - Preparation and design - High level meeting with key ministry - Socialization with wider group of stakeholder

description.narrative: 1. Updated NDC ('factsheet, presentation, video singkat, online survey) Scope yang akan dilaksanakan / rencana 2.NDC Mitigasi komponen ('factsheet, presentation, video singkat) 3. NDC Adaptasi ('factsheet, presentation, video singkat) 4. Surveys among participants

title.narrative: Number of capacity building activities that align with IO1 and IO2.

(CAEP activity code A391) Massive public campaign strategy is designed to target related stakeholders who will implement the NDC at different level of actions at national, sub-national, private sector, civil society organization, financial institutions, universities and community level. - Finalization of NDC Communication Strategy - Development and finalization of NDC Communication Plan (including media engagement and public campaign plans) - Development of communication collaterals - Planning and preparation of workshops/FGDs/trainings/events - Implementation of NDC Communication Plan - Evaluation, adjustment and celebration of results

description.narrative: Campaign products: -Production (video production, printing, merchandise, other material production) - Public and media relations (PR firm, media placements, social media ads) - Special events for the campaign ...To be developed based on discussion with MoEF (Updated NDC Draft, NDC Roadmap)
Campaign strategy is approved by GoI

title.narrative: Number of capacity building activities that align with IO1 and IO2.

(CAEP activity code A390) Series of consultation and coordination meetings/seminars/ workshops are designed and organized at sub-national level to disseminate the draft of updated NDC targets in order to socialize, consult and get inputs on how the updated NDC can be mainstreamed in the sub-national level (five different regions). - Preparation and design - Socialization Region 1 - 5

description.narrative: Reports from consultations and coordination meetings/seminars/ workshops to be prepared based on NDC Roadmap, updated NDC and, showcase lesson learned from other province, exercise for each province

title.narrative: Number of capacity building activities that align with IO1 and IO2.
The communication process to update the NDCs and share the result of the update with key stakeholders implementing the NDC is operational and effective.

description.narrative: Updated NDCs, participant surveys, participation in events

title.narrative: Extent to which GGGI’s capacity development activities have directly strengthened partner countries capacity to develop and implement green growth policies and investments. To be assessed on a 5-point scale balanced scorecard with a maximum score of 10.

Extent to which knowledge products produced and disseminated by GGGI are aligned with the four elements of green growth and have a quality impact, assessed on a 6-point balanced scorecard with a maximum score of 6.

CAEP recipient countries have benefited from increased levels of awareness, knowledge sharing and learning that contribute to their developing and implementing their Nationally Determined Contributions (NDCs)
GHG emissions reduction from business as usual (MtCO2e)
